entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Moldinium: Dependency Tracking for Blazor #46302
  • Inconsistent translation of template strings #46301
  • Support serializing polymorphic body types with STJ in R equestDelegateGenerator #46297
  • Handle PlatformNotSupportedException from NegotiateClientCertificateAsync on Mac #46294
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #46293
  • Blazor United feedback (it's good) #46292
  • Razor generates invalid code when using @bind on a component with a struct Generic Constraint #46290
  • Blazor error shows up in search results #46289
  • Be able to change protocolMode on WASM Authentication.Msal #46287
  • [Question] How to set minimal API OpenApi validation info without DataAnnotations? #46286
  • Source code build Issue #46285
  • [Question] How do I get route values in a CORS preflight request? #46284

Closed

  • `ResponseCookies.Delete(key)` not deleting when website is not in root path #46158
  • Posibility to Customize Model Binding errors Key #46238
  • Update "api" project template to use new methods on Random #46087
    8.0-preview2
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 2): General Usage #42091
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Issue with building and publishing Asp.Net 4 website in docker file #46264
  • [AOT] Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results for trimming and AOT #46075
    8.0
  • IEndpointRouteBuilder.Map throws an exception for a parameter of a nullable value type with a default value #45867
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Getting HTTP Error 503. with 0x800704e7 randomly #45934
  • ArgumentException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer #46261
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Changing reflection-base json configuration to PostConfigure #46303
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity
  • Source-build should also use the release runtime. #46299
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0.x
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Bump ua-parser-js from 0.7.32 to 0.7.33 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #46295
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview2 #46282
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update api template to use new Random APIs #46298
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Tweak Dependabot configuration #46283
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2097875 #46279
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Support manual loc builds creating a PR #46278
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-runtime
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
    area-runtime
  • Multiple accept loops in named pipes transport #46259
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Change IsTfaEnabled to IsTwoFactorEnabledAsync #46258
    area-identity, community-contribution
